EmailTemplate.name: 10_29_2015 Turbo Tip.October Tip
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbo Tip Of The Month
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
We wanted to share with you our "VMTurbo Tip" of the Month from our VMTurbo User Community (Sign Up <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/create-account.jspa>, Forgot Password <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/emailPasswordToken!input.jspa>, Forgot Username <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/forgot-username!input.jspa>) This month's VMTurbo Tip is: How to generate a report. Check our reporting glossary <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1352> on the Green Circle! Here you will find:
- Schedule delivery of recurring reports <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1783> - Create custom reports on the fly <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1785> - Insert custom SQL Reports <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-1786>
For more customizable reports create a custom dashboard <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/message/2605#2605> If you experience any issues please contact your Customer Experience Team <mailto:cxteam@vmturbo.com> and we can provide assistance Stay Green, Your Customer Experience Team
